LightningComponentBundle.description: A simple custom slider with different configuration options.

property.name: slidesData
property.label: Slides Data (JSON)
property.description: JSON array of slides with image, heading, and description properties. Example: [{'image':'url','heading':'Title','description':'Text'}]

property.name: scrollDuration
property.label: Scroll Duration (ms)
property.description: Duration in milliseconds after which the next slide is displayed

property.name: hideNavigationDots
property.label: Hide Navigation Dots
property.description: Hide the navigation dots below the slider

property.name: hideSlideNumber
property.label: Hide Slide Number
property.description: Hide the current slide number indicator

property.name: hideSlideText
property.label: Hide Slide Text
property.description: Hide the text overlay with heading and description
